gpsProducts.name: Fleet Tracking System
gpsProducts.fullDescription: Advanced fleet tracking system with real-time GPS monitoring, route optimization, and comprehensive reporting dashboard. Perfect for businesses managing multiple vehicles.

gpsProducts.name: Navigation Pro
gpsProducts.fullDescription: Professional-grade navigation system with offline maps, voice guidance, and advanced routing algorithms. Designed for commercial and personal use.

gpsProducts.name: Asset Tracker
gpsProducts.fullDescription: Compact GPS tracker for valuable assets, equipment, and personal items. Long battery life and weatherproof design.

gpsProducts.name: Marine GPS
gpsProducts.fullDescription: Advanced marine GPS system with integrated fish finder, weather monitoring, and nautical charts. Built for maritime professionals.

gpsProducts.name: Personal GPS Watch
gpsProducts.description: Wearable GPS tracker with fitness features
gpsProducts.fullDescription: Advanced GPS watch with fitness tracking, heart rate monitoring, and emergency SOS features. Perfect for outdoor enthusiasts and athletes.

gpsProducts.name: Construction Site Tracker
gpsProducts.description: Heavy-duty GPS tracker for construction equipment
gpsProducts.fullDescription: Industrial-grade GPS tracker designed for construction equipment and heavy machinery. Tamper-proof and built to withstand harsh conditions.
